Diamond::

"True, but I have seen most of the records of the council.  He might 
be in one of the hidden groups that the council kept. They had two or 
three special groups that only a few members new of. A secret group. 
I was never able to look at those lists."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer nods, glancing at Diamond. "Probably.. But a servant 
> ussually knows more about its master than just a rumor."
>
